text: Uripok () is a town in Imphal West district of the Indian state of Manipur. == Cult of Laikhurembi == In Uripok, there is a temple of Goddess Laikhurembi. A carnival like atmosphere subdues the sacred traditional ritualistic ceremonies during the festival of Lai Haraoba. Among the noisy possession of the festive events, the maibis (priestesses) dance in the gentle melodies produced by pena. When the music stopped, the maibis became possessed by the spirits. Then, they delivered oracles. The audiences listen very attentively to their words. == References == Category:Settlements in Manipur
title: Uripok
